image_analysis.description: A single image displaying four pages of a legal transcript, arranged in a two-by-two grid. The pages are numbered 273, 275, 274, and 276. The text is a question-and-answer format typical of a deposition or court hearing. A footer at the bottom contains contact information and a document identifier.
image_analysis.layout: Four-quadrant layout, with page 273 top-left, 275 top-right, 274 bottom-left, and 276 bottom-right. Each page has numbered lines of text.

18         Q. Yes, sir. But you also knew as far back

20     you were specifically identified by name in the

22     members, right?

document_metadata.subject: Cross-examination regarding the sworn testimony of Jeffrey Epstein's house staff, Juan Alessi and Alfredo Rodriguez, and its relevance to the person being questioned, as well as visits by Prince Andrew and Mr. Dershowitz.

notes: The image contains four distinct pages of a transcript (273, 274, 275, 276) presented on a single sheet. The page order in the image is not sequential.
